items.summary: In App.tsx, ensure that after the user successfully completes login (enters a valid 10-digit mobile number and clicks 'Continue'), the main billing UI — which corresponds to the billing screen container — is made visible (display: block or equivalent). The billing screen must be hidden (display: none) before login and fully visible after a successful login validation. This must work with the existing React state-based login gate logic already present in App.tsx.
